name: Mastery Talisman: Solid Guarantee
description: After your characters use a Skill, create 1 Omni Element and draw 1 card. (Can be triggered up to 3 times per Round)

descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your characters use a Skill</color>, create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color> and draw 1 card. (Can be triggered up to 3 times per Round)
